IN.IC: je pri 3. pomenu oblika za preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To hang something somewhere
pomeni nekaj pritrditi tako visoko, da je nad zemljo.

seg.quote: He was hanging his coat in the hall.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is hanging somewhere
, je zgornji del tega na nekaj pritrjen, preostali del pa je prost in brez podpore.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To hang someone
pomeni nekoga usmrtiti tako, da mu okoli vratu zavežemo vrv in mu izpod stopal vzamemo oporo, da obvisi v zraku.

Kadar neki prihodnji dogodek ali možnost
hangs over someone
, nekomu povzroča skrbi.

seg.quote: ...the threat of universal extinction hanging over all the world today.

sense.def:
To get the hang of something
pomeni začeti razumevati, kako se nekaj naredi;

seg.quote: Once you have got the hang of it, you'll be alright.

form.orth:
hang about,
hang around,
ali
hang round.

sense.def:
To hang about
,
hang around
ali
hang round somewhere
pomeni nekje ostati ali čakati;

seg.quote: We would have to hang around for a while.
I enjoyed hanging around Parliament listening to debates.

sense.def:
To hang on
pomeni nekako preživeti, dokler se položaj ne izboljša.

seg.quote: I can't keep hanging on here much longer.

sense.def:
Kadar neka stvar
hangs on another
, je odvisna od druge stvari.

seg.quote: Everything hangs on money at the moment.

sense.def:
To hang onto something
pomeni nekaj zelo trdno držati.

seg.quote: Claude hung on to Tom's shoulder.

sense.def:
To hang onto a position
pomeni poskusiti ohraniti položaj, ki ga imamo.

seg.quote: Fear is a powerful motive for hanging onto power.

sense.def:
To hang out washing
pomeni obesiti perilo na vrv, da se posuši.

To hang something up
pomeni nekaj postaviti tako, da je najvišji del podprt, preostali pa ne.

seg.quote: Howard hangs up his scarf on the hook behind the door.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is hanging up somewhere
, je nekam postavljeno tako, da se ne dotika tal.

seg.quote: There are some old tools hanging up in the shed.

sense.def:
To hang up
pomeni prekiniti telefonski pogovor.

To hang up on someone
pomeni nenadoma in nepričakovano prekiniti telefonski pogovor, tako da slušalko položimo nazaj na vilice.
